scripts.dev: corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/shared build && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/api dev" "corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/web dev"
scripts.lint: corepack pnpm --filter @equivalentes/shared build && corepack pnpm -r lint
scripts.build: corepack pnpm verify:release-sha && corepack pnpm -r --workspace-concurrency=1 build
